messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1634
messages.msgSnippet: Julie shared this wonderful scenario: 5yo says yuck to squash for dinner.  Father makes 5yo eat the entire family s servings of squash.  Mother proudly
messages.messageBody:
Julie shared this wonderful scenario:
5yo says "yuck" to squash for dinner. Father makes 5yo eat the entire
family's servings of squash. Mother proudly states that none of the kids
have said "yuck" in the 18 years since.

Oh, Yuck.
Elissa

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1634
messages.msgSnippet: Homeschool mystery solved!!! The only family I know that does school-at-home with ease is the one that is featured in the following vignette: 5yo says yuck
messages.messageBody:
Homeschool mystery solved!!!

The only family I know that does school-at-home with ease is the one that is
featured in the following vignette:

5yo says "yuck" to squash for dinner. Father makes 5yo eat the entire
family's servings of squash. Mother proudly states that none of the kids
have said "yuck" in the 18 years since.

Julie
